column16: 12. Write here your remarks about the game: which feature was missing, what failed or glitched, what was great:
It was an ok game. Don't understand the TG.
It was great to discover that the apple is more useful than the antibiotic. The voice was friendly.but the acces to the apple was so long to wait.

i failed to take care of other kids, because i didnt know. probable because there was a step to select your kid which made me feel like i have to take care of one kid. i kinda felt bad when other 2 kids died on my watch. felt like a bad mom. but yeah its a cool game to teach kids to eat well and eat what.

it wasnt missing anything i feel. as i played the game i figured it out how long am i suppose to tap to kill and how long does it take for a special pill to come. i already recommended it to my game maker friend.
I like this game. The colors match,the sound to. But i think that there no enought time to kill the bad bacteries.

positions of the tools to shoot and kill were placed poorly
